channel.title: 508 server problem
channel.description:
Hello All..
I have my own 508 server but im wondering
can ppl play on it cus its a good server and everything works..
now i want to have ppl on it...
how can they join ?
please help

item.title: 508 server problem
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Stijn_Scape Owner Stijn Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Stijn_Scape wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:2, topic:243462”][quote author=Owner Stijn Scape link=topic=319779.msg2533215#msg2533215 date=1226603251]
Hello All…

I have my own 508 server but im wondering

can ppl play on it cus its a good server and everything works…

now i want to have ppl on it…

how can they join ?
[/quote]

well this wut i did, i adverted on servers+ till i got memebers then told them to get there mates to join + add ur server to the google and u will egt people :] ill send yh the link for the google[/quote]

no you dont get it…

i didn’t had to get an ip…

i just run server and opened the 508 client…

i didn’t need to fill in a ip…

so i guess on 508 servers im the only one who can play my own server?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server problem
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“Owner Stijn Scape, post:1, topic:243462”]Hello All…

I have my own 508 server but im wondering

can ppl play on it cus its a good server and everything works…

now i want to have ppl on it…

how can they join ?[/quote]

well this wut i did, i adverted on servers+ till i got memebers then told them to get there mates to join + add ur server to the runelocus and u will egt people :] ill send yh the link for the runelocus

Read full topic
